title: Galactic Orchids

details.label: Completed Size
details.info: 4.1 x 3.9 inches or 10.3 x 10.0 cm on 14 count aida

story: Bathed in moonlight, the orchids on the coffee table transformed, their petals shimmering with the glow of distant stars. Come dawn, they would fade back to their ordinary blooms.
